name: Dream Creatures
description:
For years dream creatures have lived peacefully in dreamland. Everything changed when the nightmare creatures attacked. As a dream walker, it is your duty to save your little friends. Fight off every nightmare creatures and free the land. 

Side Notes:

The game looks better in full screen, sorry about that.

Sprite work isn't final, same as some artwork. I will keep working on this project since the concept is interesting. Thank you for your time.
